Minimum system requirements

OS : Windows XP Service Pack III, Vista Service Pack II, Windows 7
CPU : Pentium 4 2.4 Ghz Single Core processor or equivalent (2.8 Ghz for Vista/Win 7)
RAM : 512 MB or more (1 GB for Vista/Win 7)
Graphic Card : Video card with 512 MB or more memory Nvidia Geforce 6800 or ATI Radeon HD 2400
SOUND: Any sound card which supports DirectX 9.0
DIRECT X : Direct X 9.0 or more
Input: Keyboard or dual-analog gamepad

Download and install the following programs - WinRar, NET Framework, DirectX and Visual C++.

1. Download this torrent (NBA 2K13-RELOADED).

2. Right click on the file once downloaded and click 'Extract files'. NOTE: MAKE SURE YOU EXTRACT THE FILE TO A FOLDER WITH NO SPACES. FOR AN EXAMPLE, NAME THE FOLDER NBA2K13 INSTEAD OF NBA 2K13.

3. Once you have extracted 'NBA 2K13-RELOADED' into a folder, go into the folder and you'll see a setup.exe application in it along with other folders. Click on setup.exe and it will pop up with the normal instillation process, so just click next until it finishes and then go to the folders where you installed it. NOTE: SETUP.EXE WON'T RUN IF YOU HAVE SPACES IN THE FOLDER NAME. THIS ERROR MESSAGE WILL SHOW UP, 'An error occurred installing the package. Windows Installer returned '1639''.

4. In the folder crack, which is in the original folder you extracted everything to, there will be an application called nba2k13.exe and rld.dll, copy the two into the folder you installed NBA 2K13 in and delete the original application to run the game as that will not let you play the game because it recognises there is no disc, hence the reason we're copying and pasting the crack into this folder.

I hope I helped.

3. Once you have extracted 'NBA 2K13-RELOADED' into a folder, go into the folder and you'll see a setup.exe application in it along with other folders. Click on setup.exe and it will pop up with the normal instillation process, so just click next until it finishes and then go to the folders where you installed it. NOTE: SETUP.EXE WON'T RUN IF YOU HAVE SPACES IN THE FOLDER NAME. THIS ERROR MESSAGE WILL SHOW UP, 'An error occurred installing the package. Windows Installer returned '1639''.

4. In the folder crack, which is in the original folder you extracted everything to, there will be an application called nba2k13.exe and rld.dll, copy the two into the folder you installed NBA 2K13 in and delete the original application to run the game as that will not let you play the game because it recognises there is no disc, hence the reason we're copying and pasting the crack into this folder.
